elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Draw a card, otherwise [Resupply].  {H} If your Hero Expedition is behind: Exhaust up to two cards in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play a Spell — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Spell: Draw a card.  {H} If your Reserve is empty: I gain 2 boosts, otherwise I gain 1 boost.

elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next card you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If your Companion Expedition is behind: I gain 1 boost per card in your hand.  When I leave the Expedition zone — []Draw a card.
